plot: Lilo put the scissors on Elke's neck. Frank Ulrich steps in as a rescuer in times of need. Frank alarms the police, but the police doesn't believe Elke a word. Slowly, Frank also begins to doubt Elke's state of mind. Meanwhile, it seems as if the Richters' house blessing is hanging straight again. But this is not the case, because Clemens has returned to his family home for 'purely business reasons'.
